features: 2019 Latest Design Portable Charger with 25800mAh Ultra-Huge Capacity, adopts our advanced intelligent controlling IC, higher quality, safer and more reliable, powerful and longer-lasting life after 100% checked and continuous aging test;

Universal Compatibility -- The power bank compatible with iPhone Series/iwatch, Samsung Galaxy, most other Smart cell phones, Tablets, Bluetooth devices and more. It can charge 6 to 8 times to eliminate the anxiety of your battery exhaustion. Suit for travel, and other indoor outdoor activities;

Dual USB Charging & Fast Recharge -- The Dual USB ports (2.1A+1A) to charge your two devices simultaneously, Fully recharges itself in 8~12 hours with 2.1A input charger, or 12-24 hours with 1A charger;

4 LED Lights & Certified Safe -- Four led lights show the current remaining power of the item(25%~50%~75%~100%), easily press the power button to turn it on or off. Built-in smart protection system, the USB battery pack ensures complete protection for you;
24 Months Support Services -- Ekrist 25800mAh portable battery charger, Micro USB cables, user manuals. Together 2 Years friendly, easy-to-reach support! Any question, please kindly contact us.
body.description: 2019 Latest Design Portable Phone Charger Power Bank with 25800mAh Ultra-Huge Capacity---For use on the go anywhere anytime! Make sure your smart devices always connected with it all the time!★More performs in safety efficiency and compatibility etc with Advanced intelligent controlling IC 100% checked and continuous aging test which it will brings you unprecedented convenience!Features:--25800mAh High Capacity charges any smart and cell phones for 6-8 times;--Fashionable Classic Style & Ultra Slim Design Ultra comfortable skin;--Dual USB Outputs(5V/2 1A + 5V/1A) Charges two devices simultaneously without sacrificing charging speed;--High-Speed Charging With fastest speed 2 1A less time to charge more time to go out;--Flight Safe Lighter features can be securely taken on a plane or in your bag.--Widely Compatibility: Works flawlessly with Android phones(Samsung Galaxy S10+/S10/S9+/S9/S8+/S8/S7 edge/S7 etc) iPhone(iPhone XS max/XR/XS/X/8plus/8/7plus/7/6plus/6s/6 etc) Google Pixel Nexus 6P Table compatible with iPad and more...➊iPhone 6/6s/7/8 6 8 times➋iPhone 6 Plus/7 Plus/8 Plus 4 5 times➌Compatible with iPad Pro Table 2 3 times➍Other Android or USB Smart Devices Multiple timesSpecification: ●Capacity 25800mAh ●Battery Type Li-polymer(Grade A rated CE RoHs and UL certification) ●Input 5V/2 1A ●Dual Output 5V=3 1A(2 1A max + 1A) ●Item Size 0 72 X 2 95 X 5 94 inch ●Item Weight 335g/11 8oz ●Usage Temperature 0℃ 45℃Important Tips:1.We suggest you please charge power bank in full for the first using;2.Use the included cable your original cable or a third-party certified one (such as MFi) AC adapter not included.What's in the box?1 X Ekrist 25800mAh Battery Portable Charger1 X Micro USB Cable1 X User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds a lot of power and maintains much of the power when not used for a period of time.
reviews.reviewText: A few months ago, we lost our electricity for a number of hours. Although we have USB powered lights and lamps, they had all lost their power from sitting. So, we had to resort to candles and headlamps for lighting. After that experience, I decided to buy a couple power banks to be prepared if this should happen again. This power bank takes quite a while to fully charge because of the high capacity.This power bank is one of my favorites for a number of reasons.1) It has a capacity of 25,800 mAh that lasts a long time when powering USB lighting.2) I fully charged this power bank 6 months ago and intentionally didn't use it after that to see how long the charge would last. As you can see from one of my pictures, the power bank still had over half of the maximum power which would amount to about over 13,000 mAh. This is still more than the capacity of many power banks.3) This power bank is smaller than most phones, and weight only slightly more than a phone. So, it could easily be kept handy in a purse.4) It has two USB output ports so two devices can be charge at one time.5) The lights on the top of the power bank tell you how much charge is left.Overall, I like this power bank more than some of the others I bought because of the amount of power it holds and the amount of time it holds power (over 6 months).I hope this review was helpful for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasts all day charging two iPhones while hunting
reviews.reviewText: Does what it is supposed to! This battery charger lasts! It does take some time to charge, but as long as you have it charged, it will charge all your devices several times!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems like good quality!
reviews.reviewText: Was told it will take a while to charge! It did! But it’s a battery!! Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is bulky. Can't carry in purse. Works great though in car, house or outside.
reviews.reviewText: Works great but too big to carry with you say in your purse or in a carrying case with you. Caution: slow to fill up with battery life the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dependable and convenient to use.
reviews.reviewText: The battery has a long shelf life so when you need it, it is ready. It is easy to carry and to use with phones and small accessories. My wife has one in her purse and I currently use mine on my watch. I can use it to recharge my watch up to 15 times before recharging it. On phones it might help up to 3 times. For the price and convenience, it is very useful. Mine is about 3 years old and my wife's is about 3 months old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I mainly bought this because we were going on a cruise, and outlets are always so limited. This can charge an iPhone several times, as well as other devices. I know some reviews state that it takes a long time to recharge this unit, but I didn’t find that to be an issue, as we charged it when it was convenient to us and never had an issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It can charge 2 of Arlo Pro4 cameras
reviews.reviewText: I have a few portable batteries given to me purchased or actually found on the side of the road. Most can't fully charge my Galaxy S23 or a single camera on completely. This battery has been able to charge 2 Arlo Pro4 cameras on a single charge from somewhere around 20% (the cameras not the portable battery) it does take a little while to recharge the battery itself but for what I'm using it for I can live with that. I've got enough backups and found some extra long cables here to make it easier to use this to charge my cameras rather than pull my cameras down every time they needed to be recharged

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but this WILL SLOW CHARGE STEAM DECK OR HIGH POWERED DEVICES
reviews.reviewText: It works great, but this thing doesn't have the sack to charge and play devices like steam deck or ipads. Look for something that has an output of 45 watts or higher!

Yes, it takes a long time to fully charge (it'll definitely need a full overnight) but it's worth it. I'm able to get 2 full phone charges out of it. Seems to hold its charge well too but I haven't had it that long. Weighs a little more than my phone (galaxy s23) but slim and easy to pack away anywhere. Worth every penny.

I am happy with my purchase. I did read the reviews and my mind was coloured with the length of time it takes to charge. I plugged the USB in and yes 24 hours passed and it still was not charged. The problem was I did not insert the USB properly into the charger. The moment I fixed the problem, it charged in no time. I realize that it is heavy but I also realize that it can charge more that just a cellphone and that it maybe needed to be able to keep a charge for a period of time. I will reviev again after six months or so.
Had this for months. One USB port charges slower than the other however. But the portable charger has worked wonders for me! I used it while traveling and it never failed me!
Got it fast. Easy instructions. Everything is working just like it should. 5 stars 👍

reviews.reviewTitle: Works in a pinch, if it keeps working.
reviews.reviewText: It's heavier than I figured, which is fine for me, but it also charges really slow. It took almost 14 hours to fully charge my phone, and then became fussy and has now stopped charging at all. Unfortunately, it's past the 30 day return window, so I can't even do anything about it. No Bueno.
